name: Signature Logo T
description:
Available in Large all other Sizes Sold Out

PAYMENT 
Use paypal through the website and follow the instructions.

DELIVERY 
Estimated delivery times within the UK are 3-5 working days. This may vary depending on the Royal Mail. Any orders outside the UK will take longer.

WASHING 
Use a washing machine at a warm temperature (max 30 degrees Celsius) . To maintain the high quality print make sure to iron on the inside on the T shirt and not directly on the design.


RETURNS 
No refunds are available with the exception of genuine faulty goods. All goods are checked before shipping to ensure high quality. However should your goods be faulty send us an image within 2 days of arrival on espo.original@gmail.com and we will discuss the return. In accordance to your rights we will be pleased to refund any justified complaints where goods are found to be defective.

Unfortunately we are unable to provide refunds if the goods have been worn or used.

If you would like to request a return of your order, please contact us. Additionaly if you wish to exchange we will only be able to do that if we have your size in stock.
